StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMissionFiscalYears]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--The join with ocs_class table is needed and the .scal_years are retrieved from the ocs_classtable instead -- of ship_mission_plan table because .scal_year is 0 for all OCC recors in the ship_mission_plan table
select dis.nct OC..scal_year from OFFICER_SHIP_MISSION_PLAN OMP inner join OCS_CLASS OC ON OC.CLASS_NUMBER = OMP.OCC_CLASS_NUMBER order by OC..scal_year
SET NOCOUNT OFF
